name: Celebrity Explainer
description:
We all know that there are just too many celebrities out there, more than any one person can possibly know about!

Celebrity Explainer is here to help.

Using our helpful tool, you too can assist in creating the definitive biographies of these very real people. Simply download the application and then fill out a short questionnaire. Soon you'll have explained more celebrities than you can shake a stick at!

Don't forget to save your results with the handy photo button, and share them with the hashtag #celebrityexplainer so that others can learn the important facts about famous people you know!

-----------------------------------------------------------------

Design & Programming by Nick Kornek

Sweet Art by James Palermo

v1.1 Update - Now with theme music!
